description:
Discover unique items from local boutiques and purchase them for same-day delivery or collection. Live in London & Brighton with nationwide shipping now available on over 3,000 products.

As featured on the BBC, Guardian, Company Magazine, Sunday Times and Wired Magazine.

"Is this our new favourite app? We think so" - Company Magazine

“StreetHub collects the vibrancy of the capital’s myriad independent retailers” – Wired

We’ve handpicked the best items from the best independent shops in London & Brighton. StreetHub shows you, in real-time, what the best fashion and home products are in local shops near you. You can even buy items for instant collection, 90 minute delivery or UK-wide shipping.

Explore unique collections of curated items. Follow your favourite stores to be the first to know about new items. Share your newest discoveries and get inspiration from others by seeing what’s trending.

Why use StreetHub: 
- Discover the hidden gems of London & Brighton and find unique home and fashion products in your area 
- We’ve curated the best items from the best shops 
- Keep up to date with the latest trends across London 
- Follow your favourite shops to find out what's new

Features: 
- Browse shops and items by location, shop or category 
- Purchase items in the app and they’ll be kept aside for you in-store, or choose same-day delivery and have them delivered to you in 1-2 hours for shops close by you. Or look for the "UK Shipping" label to have items posted to you anywhere in the UK
- Get information on opening times of and directions to the shops
- Save 10% off the in-store price by buying in-app

We've got over 300 shops from Brighton, Shoreditch, Notting Hill, Islington & Clerkenwell, Bloomsbury, Marylebone, Mayfair & Covent Garden, Stoke Newington & Hackney, and many more areas. Can't find your favourite shop? Let us know at boutiques@streethub.com and we'll get them on board for you. 

We’d love to hear your feedback. Please send us your ideas for improving StreetHub, just drop an email to hello@streethub.com and we’ll be in touch. Unfortunately, we can’t respond to your comments here on the App Store.
trackCensoredName: StreetHub – Discover unique items from the best independent local shops & boutiques
trackName: StreetHub – Discover unique items from the best independent local shops & boutiques
releaseNotes:
We're proud to release a redesign of the StreetHub app. Thank you to our wonderful users and customers - you spoke, we listened.

Introducing Explore - we want you to get inspired by browsing curated collections of products.

Browsing products near you just became easier than ever. Just select the type of product you're looking for and dive in. You can even sort by price, distance or sale items.

By popular demand we've now introduced nationwide UK shipping for over 3,000 products, with more being added daily - conveniently shop from the best London & Brighton boutiques, wherever you are. Of course we still offer same-day click & collect and delivery for boutiques near you.
